#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int x,one,two,i;
    cin>>x;
    if(x==0)
        cout<<"1";
    else if(x==1)
        cout<<"0";
    else
    {
        two=x/2;
        one=x%2;

        for(i=0;i<one;i++)
        {
            cout<<"4";
        }
        for(i=0;i<two;i++)
            cout<<"8";
    }

    return 0;
}
